text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump A #lowcarb diet that includes plenty of unprocessed meats is the best way help reverse chronic diseases that make #COVID19 lethal. If we had to live off grains, seed oils, & processed foods during these months, we would be making those diseases worse. Thank you, @realDonaldTrump
